control-parameters-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for defining command-line parameters for a flowchart.

crystal-builder-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for creating crystals from prototypes, including Strukturbericht designations.

custom-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for custom Python scripts in a flowchart.

dftbplus-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for DFTB+, a fast quantum mechanical simulation code.

forcefield-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for setting up a forcefield or EAM potentials for subsequent simulations.

from-smiles-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for creating structures from a SMILES string.

gaussian-step.description: A SEAMM plugin for A SEAMM plug-in for Gaussian

geometry-analysis-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for analysis of the geometry of particularly small molecules

lammps-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for LAMMPS, a forcefield-based molecular dynamics code.

loop-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in which provides loops in flowcharts.

mopac-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in to setup, run and analyze semiempirical calculations with MOPAC

packmol-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for building periodic boxes of fluid using Packmol

psi4-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in to setup, run and analyze quantum chemistry calculations using Psi4

pyxtal-step.description: A SEAMM plugin for PyXtal for building atomic and molecular crystals.

quickmin-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for simple, quick minimization

rdkit-step.description: A SEAMM plugin for A SEAMM plug-in for RDKit

read-structure-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in to read common formats in computational chemistry

seamm.description: The core of the SEAMM environment and graphical interface.

seamm-dashboard.description: The Web Dashboard for SEAMM (Simulation Environment for Atomistic and Molecular Simulations).

seamm-exec.description: Classes to execute background codes for SEAMM

seamm-installer.description: The installer/updater for SEAMM (Simulation Environment for Atomistic and Molecular Simulations).

set-cell-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for setting the periodic (unit) cell.

strain-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for straining periodic systems

supercell-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for building supercells of periodic systems.

table-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for data tables in a flowchart.

thermal-conductivity-step.description: A SEAMM plug-in for Thermal Conductivity
